results.description: Olympic and World gymnastics champion Simone Biles throws out the first pitch - with a backflip - before the Washington Nationals take a 2-0 lead over the Houston Astros in the World Series.
results.shortTitle: Watch: Biles throws first pitch before Nationals thrash Astros
results.title: World Series: Simone Biles throws first pitch as Washington Nationals thrash Houston Astros to extend lead

results.description: Ireland's Rhys McClenaghan targets Olympic gold after securing a bronze medal at the World Gymnastics Championships.
results.title: 'I've reinvented myself after surgery' - McClenaghan targets Olympic gold after world bronze

results.description: World Champion gymnast Max Whitlock takes you through high-intensity interval training routine featuring six exercises to work out your whole body.
results.title: Max Whitlock's HIIT routine

results.description: BBC Sport looks at how Simone Biles, Brigid Kosgei and Coco Gauff made the headlines in a record-breaking weekend.
results.shortTitle: Biles, Kosgei & Gauff - a record-breaking weekend
results.title: Biles, Kosgei and Gauff - how the female trio are lighting up sport

thumbnail.altText: Simone Biles, Brigid Kosgei and Coco Gauff

results.description: Este fin de semana fue uno de grandes conquistas para las mujeres en el deporte con los récords alcanzados por la gimnasta estadounidense Simone Biles, la tenista estadounidense Coco Gauff, y la corredora keniana Brigid Kosgei.
results.title: Biles, Gauff y Kosgei: los tres récords conseguidos por las deportistas en un fin de semana estelar

thumbnail.altText: Simone Biles, Coco Gauff, y Brigid Kosgei.

results.description: Simone Biles becomes the most decorated gymnast in World Championships history with five gold medals in Stuttgart, to take her tally to a staggering 25.
results.title: Simone Biles: The world's greatest gymnast

results.description: La gimnasta estadounidense impuso un nuevo récord de medallas en un Mundial de Gimnasia al finalizar en Sttutgart, Alemania, con 25 preseas. La competencia vio su espectacular triple-doble salto en la fase clasificatoria de este mundial. Hasta que lo logró Biles, el movimiento nunca había sido realizado con éxito en una competición.
results.shortTitle: Los casi imposibles "pasos" del extraordinario triple-doble salto de Simone Biles
results.title: Simone Biles: los casi imposibles "pasos" del extraordinario triple-doble salto de la gimnasta estadounidense

results.description: American Simone Biles wins her 25th World Championships medal with gold in the floor final in Stuttgart, Germany.
results.shortTitle: Biles wins another gold in floor final
results.title: Simon Biles wins gold in floor final at World Championships

results.description: Simone Biles becomes the most decorated gymnast in World Championships history by winning two more golds on Sunday to reach 25 medals overall.
results.title: Simone Biles: Gymnast breaks World Championships medals record

thumbnail.altText: US gymnast Simone Biles celebrates winning balance beam gold at the 2019 World Championships

results.description: Britain's Joe Fraser wins his first World Gymnastics Championships gold medal with victory in the men's parallel bars.
results.shortTitle: GB's Fraser wins parallel bars gold
results.title: World Gymnastics Championships: Joe Fraser wins Britain's first parallel bars gold

thumbnail.altText: British gymnast Joe Fraser holds up the Union Jack after winning World Championship gold in the men's parallel bars

results.description: Joe Fraser wins Great Britain's first ever gold medal on the parallel bars at the World Gymnastics Championships in Stuttgart.
results.shortTitle: GB's Fraser wins shock gold on parallel bars
results.title: Joe Fraser GB gymnast wins World Championships gold on parallel bars

results.description: Simone Biles becomes the most decorated gymnast in World Championships history by winning her 24th medal with gold on the balance beam.
results.shortTitle: Biles wins beam gold to become most decorated gymnast in World Champs history
results.title: Simone Biles: Gymnast wins beam gold for record 24th World Championships medal

results.description: Newtownards gymnast Rhys McClenaghan is thrilled as he clinches a world championship bronze "in the best pommel final I have ever seen".
results.shortTitle: McClenaghan 'proud' as he clinches world bronze
results.title: McClenaghan 'proud' as he clinched world bronze

thumbnail.altText: Rhys McClenaghan has won Commonwealth Games and European Championship pommel gold medals during his career
Rhys McClenaghan has won Commonwealth Games and European Championship pommel gold medals during his career
Rhys McClenaghan has won Commonwealth Games and European Championship pommel gold medals during his career
Rhys McClenaghan has won Commonwealth Games and European Championship pommel gold medals during his career

results.description: Great Britain's Becky Downie wins silver on the uneven bars - her first individual medal at world or Olympic level - behind gold medal winner Nina Derwael of Belgium.
results.shortTitle: GB's Becky Downie wins silver on uneven bars
results.title: World Gymnastics Championships: GB's Becky Downie wins silver on uneven bars

results.description: On a successful day for Great Britain Max Whitlock wins gold, Becky Downie claims silver and younger sister Ellie takes bronze in Stuttgart.
results.title: World Gymnastics Championships: Max Whitlock wins gold, Downie sisters claim medals

results.description: Max Whitlock regains his world title with victory in the pommel final at the World Gymnastics Championships.
results.shortTitle: GB's Whitlock wins third pommel world title
results.title: Max Whitlock: British gymnast wins third pommel World Championships title

results.description: Simone Biles matches Vitaly Scherbo's record of 23 World Gymnastics Championships medals with gold on the vault as Great Britain's Ellie Downie takes bronze.
results.shortTitle: Biles equals medal record at Worlds
results.title: Simone Biles: American equals World Championships record with 23rd medal

results.description: Rhys McClenaghan of Ireland finishes third in Saturday's pommel horse event at World Gymnastics Championships in Stuttgart.
results.title: Ireland's McClenaghan wins World Championship bronze

results.description: Great Britain's Ellie Downie takes bronze on the vault as Simone Biles wins a record-equalling 23rd World Gymnastics Championships medal with gold.
results.shortTitle: Biles wins vault gold as GB's Ellie Downie takes bronze
results.title: Simone Biles wins vault gold as Ellie Downie takes bronze at World Championships

thumbnail.altText: Jade Clarey, Simone Biles & Ellie Downie

results.description: Nikita Nagornyy's incredible vault helps the Russian win the men's all-around title at the World Gymnastics Championships.
results.shortTitle: Watch 'one of the most difficult vaults in the world' as Nagornyy wins all-around
results.title: World Gymnastics Championships: Russia's Nagornyy wins all-around title
